name: Rythmic SAT
description: Entry without pitch, constant progression until reaching 180° + 1 straight rotation at the end

criterias.normal: rhythm and regularity of the variation of the axis, flow, angle, exit or connection
criterias.twisted: twisted on the entry, must stay twisted, untwist at the exit and NOT during the turns
criterias.devil twist: from a twisted situation, change of twist direction (within one turn)

connection: Forbidden connection to Tumbling, Infinite and Anti Rhythmic
